definition: red neckscarf/by extension, a member of the Young Pioneers
cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
face flannel or towel/shroud (over the face of a corpse)
Yellow Turbans Peasant Uprising at the end of later Han (from 184)

sentences.english: Sterile drapes were whisked onto the patient's chest and pelvis.
sentences.chinese: 护士将无菌手术巾铺在病人胸部和骨盆上。

sentences.english: Tuck the bandage gently around the hand and arm.
sentences.chinese: 轻轻地绕过手和手臂折起三角巾。

sentences.english: I take the washcloth from the shower caddie and gently scrub my feet.
sentences.chinese: 我拿起澡巾，开始轻轻地擦我的脚。

sentences.english: Then, he had accepted the treatment consisted of a figure-of-eight splint and sling immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 当时他接受八字肩带和三角巾悬挂固定的治疗。

sentences.english: In a cloth book taking with him, the General find his lucky hierogram given by the Mashan Fox.
sentences.chinese: 在随身携带的巾书里，将军发现了当年的灵符。

sentences.english: Blood spilled onto the drapes and streamed to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 血液溢出到手术巾上，又流到地板上。

sentences.english: Knead the dough again and allow it to rest for another 45 minutes with a damp towel covered.
sentences.chinese: 取出面团再次揉匀，盖上湿布巾再松弛45分钟。

sentences.english: Packing your beach towel and suntan lotion will not, by itself, make you Hemingway.
sentences.chinese: 装上你的沙滩巾和防晒霜本身不会让你变成海明威。

sentences.english: Oh, boy , look at all the photos we've taken. We've already got three albums full.
sentences.chinese: 看我们拍了这么多照片，已经巾满了三本相册。

sentences.english: Let's put our beach towel and picnic basket under the sun umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 我们先把海滩巾和野餐篮放在遮洋伞底下。

sentences.english: Cover the dough with a plastic wrap and top with a wet towel.
sentences.chinese: 面团盖上保鲜膜后再铺条湿布巾。

sentences.english: Either massage product into the skin or leave on as a masque. Remove with a damp face cloth.
sentences.chinese: 可以适度按摩面膜提高肌肤吸收或者用洗脸巾洗掉。

sentences.english: Woman and baby care products, Baby hygiene products/Wipes, Elderly care products, Other raw materials pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 擦拭巾，老人护理用品，其他原辅材料展区。

sentences.english: Paste the fruit or seeds on drawing paper.
sentences.chinese: 把这些果实或种子巾在画纸上。

definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
face flannel or towel/shroud (over the face of a corpse)
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
